title: rangA shrIrangA
sahitya:
rangA shrIrangAvenranudinam azhaittun arugirukka Ashai koNDE vandEn


anupallavi

  shen kamala shelvi shErndurai mArbinil tangum tuLabha maNam engum vIshum parimaLa


caraNam    kaNDEn nin ezhil mEniyum gati tarum kazhal koNDEn kali tIrkkum nAmam aham kuLira viNDEn vaiyam tanil
maTrOr pughal vENDEn paNDu valvinai aghaTriDak-kazhal toNDu sheidunnaruL koNdu UyndiDa
